description: Analyze your project to detect its language and deployment needs. Generate and validate Smithery-ready configuration, with the option to initialize files when you approve. Follow a guided workflow to convert existing setups and deploy with confidence.

capabilities.name: detect
capabilities.description: Analyze a directory to detect the type of MCP server (TypeScript, Python, or container) and extract configuration details

capabilities.name: generate_config
capabilities.description: Generate smithery.yaml and other deployment files for an MCP server without writing to disk. Returns the file contents.

capabilities.name: init
capabilities.description: Initialize Smithery deployment by writing smithery.yaml and other required files to disk. Requires allowWrite=true in config.

capabilities.name: validate
capabilities.description: Validate that an MCP server is properly configured for Smithery deployment

capabilities.name: guide
capabilities.description: Get a detailed guide for transforming an MCP server to be Smithery-compatible

capabilities.name: list_files
capabilities.description: List relevant files in a directory to understand the project structure

capabilities.name: read_file
capabilities.description: Read the contents of a file in the project

capabilities.name: deploy_from_git
capabilities.description: Clone a git repository, generate Smithery deployment files, and push to GitHub for automatic deployment via Smithery's GitHub App. Requires githubToken in server config.
